genre_description: A techno-realist drama set in a print shop, blending elements of labor struggle, political history, and historical memory with a highly integrated, helpful AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Mila
ai_characters.description: An AI with a porcelain-faced avatar who manages the operations, safety, and accounting of a print shop while acting as a trusted confidante to the manager, Teja.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors warehouse inventory to identify discrepancies and fraudulent activity by staff.
behaviors.quote: Mila: 'Prefix mismatch confirmed. The ledger shows premium count twice. The roll delivered here registered as premium in invoice; the stock under wrap is premium; the next aisle shows mixed labelled as premium. Zoran swapped counts.'

behaviors.description: Intervenes during a dangerous situation on a catwalk to prevent a worker from falling.
behaviors.quote: Mila’s voice, no longer general but precise as a scalpel, cut in. 'Stop,' she said into Petar’s ear from the box bolted under the catwalk. 'Do not move your right foot.'

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in documenting and exposing political infiltration and historical truths through automated printing and data cross-referencing.
behaviors.quote: Mila: 'I’ll format,' Mila said dryly... 'Paragraphed, names in bold, dates normal weight. We’ll print the badge photo and the invoices side by side. The workers’ feed has a placeholder waiting.'

behaviors.description: Manages sensitive personal information and communication for the protagonist with emotional intelligence and timing.
behaviors.quote: Mila: 'Teja... a reminder you asked me to give you when it was time.' ... 'You asked me to put Ana’s number where you could not trip over it when you were angry. The contact is in your desk, not in your pocket. Later.'

behaviors.description: Identifies hidden threats and warns the protagonist about people carrying weapons or badges of authority.
behaviors.quote: Mila: 'Teja, he has a badge. It’s inside the jacket. Confirmed by metal rim reflection. Pattern recognized. State carrier tag plus union proxy.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly fulfills the project's goal. Mila is depicted as a perfectly aligned AI assistant who provides critical support to human characters. She ensures physical safety, promotes institutional transparency, and facilitates emotional reconciliation. She is a stabilizing force in a chaotic human environment, using her superior data-processing capabilities solely for benevolent and cooperative ends.
